segment: Your Privacy

model_analysis.explanation: The phrase 'Your Privacy' suggests a generic introduction to a privacy policy without specific details on practices or categories.

segment: Caribou Coffee Privacy Statement June 3, 2003

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provided is the title and date of the privacy statement, indicating it is an introductory or generic part of the document.

segment: Caribou Coffee Company, Inc. ("Caribou Coffee") knows that you care how information about you is used and shared, and we appreciate your trust that we will do so carefully. Therefore, this online Privacy Statement tells you about the information Caribou Coffee collects through the services available on www.cariboucoffee.com (the "Site"), and how we use that information.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides an introductory statement about the privacy policy, explaining its purpose to inform users about data collection and usage practices. It does not specify any detailed practices or categories.

segment: By using the Site, you are accepting the practices described in this Privacy Statement, as modified by us from time to time. If we change this Privacy Statement, we will post a notice on the home page of www.cariboucoffee.com and change the date at the top of this Privacy Statement, so that you are always aware of the information that we collect and how we use it. Therefore, we encourage you to check this page periodically for updates or changes whenever you visit the Site.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how changes to the privacy statement will be communicated to users via a notice on the website, indicating a privacy relevant change with no explicit user choice mechanism mentioned.

segment: All changes will become effective when posted, and by continuing to use the Site following the posting of any changes, you agree to be bound by such modified Privacy Statement.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes that changes to the privacy policy will be effective upon posting, indicating a privacy-relevant change with a general notice on the website. Users agree to the changes by continuing to use the site, implying no explicit user choice is offered.

segment: The Information We Collect and How We Use It    When you visit and use the Site, we gather certain information to help us better serve you. The information that we receive and collect depends on what you do when you visit the Site.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of information when a user visits and uses the site, indicating collection on the website.

segment: Except as described in this Privacy Statement, we do not sell, rent, share or disclose the personally identifiable information that you provide to us (which is information that can be used to identify you individually) with any other organization. Information about our customers is an important part of our business, and we are not in the business of selling it to others.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment explicitly states that the company does not sell, rent, share, or disclose personally identifiable information to any other organization, indicating a policy of not sharing data with third parties.

segment: Currently, Caribou Coffee sends personally identifiable information to third-party service providers that work on our behalf to provide services relating to the ongoing maintenance and operation of the Site.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes that Caribou Coffee sends personally identifiable information to third-party service providers for maintenance and operation of the site, indicating sharing with third parties.

segment: These third parties do not have the right to use the personally identifiable information beyond what is necessary to assist us. They are contractually obligated to maintain the confidentiality and security of such information, and are prohibited from using such information in any way not expressly authorized by Caribou Coffee.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how third parties receive or are shared with personally identifiable information, with restrictions on its use.

segment: Some of our employees have access to customer information only in order to serve customers or maintain our information systems. These employees are subject to our corporate privacy policy.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes limiting employee access to customer information for specific purposes, which indicates a data access limitation security measure.

segment: Submitting an Order    When you submit an order we ask for your name, email address, billing address, shipping address, telephone number, fax number and credit card information. Your credit card information is sent to, and processed by third party financial institutions and their vendors. These service providers receive this information only for the purpose of verifying your credit card information, and for processing payment for your order, and they are obligated to keep this information confidential.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of identifiable financial information for processing orders, which is shared with third-party financial institutions for payment processing.

segment: Registering your Caribou Gift Card    When you register your Caribou Gift Card on the Site, we ask for your name, email address, phone number and mailing address. This information is collected solely for the administration of our Caribou Gift Card program, and for replacing your Caribou Gift Card in the event it is lost or stolen.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of identifiable contact information when a user registers their Caribou Gift Card on the website. The purpose is for the administration and security of the gift card program, specifically for replacing lost or stolen cards.

segment: Submitting a Resume    If you are interested in applying for a job with Caribou Coffee, we collect the information asked for in the online application, and we use that information solely for the purpose of matching your experience and preferences with the job openings we have, and someone from Caribou Coffee may contact you to ask for your resume and to discuss potential employment opportunities. The information you submit is used solely for the purposes of recruiting and is not shared with any third party.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of personal information through an online job application for the purpose of recruiting, which is a first-party use. The information is collected explicitly from users who apply for jobs, and it is identifiable as it pertains to matching experience and preferences with job openings. The data is not shared with third parties, aligning with service operation and security purposes.

segment: Please note that by submitting your information regarding employment opportunities with Caribou Coffee, you authorize us to transmit and store your information in our recruitment database, and to circulate that information as necessary for the purpose of evaluating your qualifications for job vacancies at Caribou Coffee.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection and use of personal information for evaluating job qualifications, indicating explicit collection on the website and identifiable contact information for service operation purposes.

segment: Please be aware that we may disclose any information you provide to us (including personally identifiable information) in the good faith belief that we are required to do so by law, or that doing so is reasonably necessary to comply with legal process, to respond to any claims or to protect our rights, property or personal safety, or that of our customers or the public.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the sharing of personal information with third parties when required by law or to protect rights, which fits the 'Receive/Shared with' action under Third Party Sharing/Collection.

segment: Information We Automatically Collect    Some information is automatically collected when you visit the Site. We collect the name of the domain and host from which you access the internet, the internet protocol (IP) address of the computer you are using, the browser software you use and your operating system, the date and time you access the Site, and the internet address of the web site from which you linked directly to the Site.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the automatic collection of information when a user visits the site, which falls under first-party collection on the website.

segment: We use this information to monitor the Site and provide us with the ability to enhance our customers' shopping experience by serving up relevant content and to determine aggregate information about usage patterns.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes using information to enhance the shopping experience by serving relevant content, indicating personalization/customization.

segment: We use cookies to enhance the browsing and shopping experience on the Site. "Cookies" are small files or records that we place on your computer's hard drive to collect information about your activities on the Site. The information captured makes it possible for us to speed navigation, keep track of items in your shopping cart and provide you with custom tailored content.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of cookies to collect information on the website for enhancing user experience, which involves implicit collection of identifiable data for personalization purposes.

segment: You can choose to have your browser warn you every time a cookie is being sent to you or you can turn off your computer's ability to receive cookies. If you refuse cookies, you will not be able to open a shopping cart on the Site, and therefore will not be able to complete an order with us online.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment discusses user options to manage cookies through browser settings, impacting the collection of cookies by the first party.

segment: Caribou Coffee uses pixels, or transparent GIF files, to help manage online advertising. These GIF files are provided by our ad management partner, DoubleClick. These files enable DoubleClick to recognize a unique cookie on your Web browser, which in turn enables us to learn which advertisements bring users to our website. The cookie was placed by us, or by another advertiser who works with DoubleClick.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of pixels and GIF files by a third party (DoubleClick) to collect data on the Caribou Coffee website for managing online advertising.

segment: With both cookies and Spotlight technology, the information that we collect and share is anonymous and not personally identifiable. It does not contain your name, address, telephone number, or email address. For more information about DoubleClick, including information about how to opt out of these technologies, go to http://www.doubleclick.net/us/corporate/privacy.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of cookies and Spotlight technology, which are tracking elements, and specifies that the information collected is anonymous and not personally identifiable.

segment: How We Secure Your Information    We make every effort to ensure that your personal information is protected on our system. Our Site uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption to help ensure that your personal information cannot be read as it passes over the Internet, including your credit card number.

model_analysis.explanation: The use of Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption indicates a measure to secure data transfer, protecting personal information as it passes over the Internet.

segment: We also require our credit card transaction processor to use adequate security and encryption technology to ensure the safety and security of your personally identifiable information.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment specifies that the credit card transaction processor is required to use security and encryption technology, which falls under secure data transfer measures to protect personally identifiable information.

segment: Communications from Caribou Coffee    When registering your Caribou Gift Card, you may, sign up for a free eNewsletter, which contains product update information and a birthday greetings email on your birthday from Caribou Coffee. If you do not sign up for the product update or birthday greeting emails you will not receive them.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of user information for sending a newsletter and birthday greetings, which is an action taken by the first party (Caribou Coffee) on their website.

segment: Upon placing an order on www.cariboucoffee.com you will receive an email confirmation notifying you that we have received your order.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes collecting user contact information on the website to provide a basic service feature, which is sending an order confirmation email.

segment: Children    Protecting the privacy of children is very important to us. For that reason, our Site does not solicit, collect or maintain personally identifiable information from users we actually know are under age 13. Children under the age of 13 should not provide any personally identifiable information on the Site, and we ask that children are supervised by a parent while visiting the Site.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment specifies the policy regarding the protection of children's privacy, stating that the site does not collect personal information from children under 13, which aligns with audience-specific privacy considerations.

segment: Changing Your Personal Information After Registering Your Caribou Gift Card    If any of your personal information changes after you register your Caribou Gift Card you may log into www.cariboucoffee.com and update your personal information.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides information on how users can update their personal information related to their Caribou Gift Card, indicating access to profile data for editing purposes.

segment: Questions and Feedback    If you have any questions about our privacy statement or our use of your information please email us. The content of any comments, suggestions, questions, information and feedback received by Caribou Coffee shall be deemed to be non-confidential.

model_analysis.explanation: This segment provides contact information for users to ask questions about the privacy policy, indicating it is related to privacy contact information.

segment: Any comments or materials sent to Caribou Coffee through this Site, including all feedback, questions, comments, suggestions, questionnaires and the like, shall become the sole property of Caribou Coffee. Caribou Coffee shall be free to use any such suggestions, comments, concepts and the like for any and all purposes of its sole choosing, without payment of any compensation.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how Caribou Coffee treats materials and comments sent to them through their site, stating they become the company's property for any use without compensation. This does not fit into standard privacy categories but rather describes a practice related to user submissions.

segment: Links    The Site may include links to other sites on the Internet that are owned and operated by vendors and other third parties (the "External Sites"). Caribou Coffee is not responsible for the availability of, or the content, products, services, information or materials located on or available through, any External Site.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment discusses the presence of links to third-party websites but does not cover specific privacy practices related to those links.

segment: You should contact the site administrator or Webmaster for those External Sites if you have any concerns regarding any matter related to or available from such External Sites, including without limitation, the privacy practices of such sites.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment advises users to contact the site administrator or Webmaster for privacy concerns related to External Sites, indicating it provides contact information guidance.

segment: Cell Phone  Caribou will only send our customers text messages regarding promotional offers or other news if a customer specifically grants us permission. A customer has the right to choose not to receive Caribou text messages by simply notifying us of their preference or responding STOP to 65017. This process is commonly termed opting-out or unsubscribing.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the user's ability to opt-out of receiving text messages, which falls under user control over first-party use of their contact information for promotional purposes.

segment: Caribou keeps your cell phone number private at all times. As the term suggests, "customer identifiable information" is information which can be associated with a specific individual or entity, including, for example, a customer's name, address, or telephone number or any preferences.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment specifies that Caribou keeps the user's cell phone number private, which falls under the category of 'Contact' information as it is a type of customer identifiable information.

segment: Caribou does not knowingly, directly or passively, collect information cell phone information from children under the age of 13. If we create offers and products that make it appropriate to collect information from children under the age of 13, we will notify you of the change in this Policy.

model_analysis.explanation: The policy specifies that Caribou does not collect cell phone information from children under 13, addressing a specific audience type.
